name: assail
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ T ] to attack someone violently or criticize someone strongly: The victim had been assailed with repeated blows to the head and body. He was assailed with insults and abuse as he left the court.
[ T often passive ] to cause someone to experience a lot of unpleasant things: to be assailed by doubts/fears/problems
